graph_title: Procenat mladih (u dobi od 15-24 godine) koji nisu u obrazovanju, zapošljavanju ili obuci
indicator_definition: This proportion of youth (aged 15-24 years) not in education, employment or training, also known as "the NEET rate", conveys the number of young persons not in education, employment or training as a percentage of the total youth population.
indicator_name: Procenat mladih (u dobi od 15-24 godine) koji nisu u obrazovanju, zapošljavanju ili obuci
target_name: Do 2020. godine znatno smanjiti udio mladih koji nisu zaposleni, niti u procesu obrazovanja ili obuke
